original: @361a rgya gar skad du /
analyzed: @361a rgya gar skad du /
translated: In Sanskrit:

original: de ba pa ri pri tstsha mam ga la g'a th'a /
analyzed: de ba pa ri pri tstsha mam ga la g'a th'a /
translated: Devapariprcchā-mangalagāthā

original: bod skad du /
analyzed: bod skad du /
translated: In Tibetan:

original: lhas zhus pa'i bkra shis kyi tshigs su bcad pa /
analyzed: lhas zhus pa'i bkra shis kyi tshigs su bcad pa /
translated: The Verses of Auspiciousness Requested by the Gods

original: dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to the Three Jewels!

original: gzhan gyis mi thub rdzogs sangs rgyas //
analyzed: gzhan gyis mi thub rdzogs sangs rgyas //
translated: The perfect Buddha, invincible,🔽while the Protector was dwelling in one place,

original: mgon po phyogs gcig bzhugs pa na; ;lha gcig dpa' bo chen po la //
analyzed: mgon po phyogs gcig bzhugs pa na; ;lha gcig dpa' bo chen po la //
translated: the sole hero, the One God,

original: phyag 'tshal 'di skad tshig gsol to //
analyzed: phyag 'tshal 'di skad tshig gsol to //
translated: paid homage and spoke these words:

original: dge ba don du gnyer ba na //
analyzed: dge ba don du gnyer ba na //
translated: When striving for the sake of virtue,

original: lha dang mi rnams so so nas //
analyzed: lha dang mi rnams so so nas //
translated: the gods and humans, each one,

original: bkra shis dag ni brjod bgyis na //
analyzed: bkra shis dag ni brjod bgyis na //
translated: recite the auspicious verses.

original: bkra shis dam pa gang zhig lags //
analyzed: bkra shis dam pa gang zhig lags //
translated: What is the supreme auspiciousness?

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa //
translated: The Blessed One replied:

original: dge ba don du gnyer ba na //
analyzed: dge ba don du gnyer ba na //
translated: When striving for the sake of virtue,

original: lha dang mi rnams so so nas //🔽bkra shis rnams ni rjod byed pa //
analyzed: lha dang mi rnams so so nas // bkra shis rnams ni rjod byed pa //
translated: the gods and humans, each one,🔽recite the auspicious verses.

original: de dag bkra shis @361b brjod par bya //
analyzed: de dag bkra shis @361b brjod par bya //
translated: Those are the auspicious verses to be recited.

original: yul bzang gnas dang grogs mchog dang // sngon chad bsod nams byas pa dang // sems ni legs par gtad byas pa //
analyzed: yul bzang gnas dang grogs mchog dang // sngon chad bsod nams byas pa dang // sems ni legs par gtad byas pa //
translated: and the mind well-directed,

original: de ni bkra shis dam pa yin //
analyzed: de ni bkra shis dam pa yin //
translated: are the highest good fortune.🔽Generosity, very pleasant speech,🔽certainty in the true meaning,

original: sbyin dang shin tu snyan smra dang // yang dag don la rnam nges dang // khrims ldan rnams dang mtshungs sbyor ba //
analyzed: sbyin dang shin tu snyan smra dang // yang dag don la rnam nges dang // khrims ldan rnams dang mtshungs sbyor ba //
translated: and association with those who have moral discipline,

original: de ni bkra shis dam pa yin //
analyzed: de ni bkra shis dam pa yin //
translated: are the highest good fortune.🔽Not relying on fools,🔽relying on the wise,

original: byis pa rnams la mi bsten dang // mkhas pa rnams la bsten pa dang // mchod 'os rnams la mchod byed pa //
analyzed: byis pa rnams la mi bsten dang // mkhas pa rnams la bsten pa dang // mchod 'os rnams la mchod byed pa //
translated: and worshipping those who are worthy of worship,

original: de ni bkra shis dam pa yin //
analyzed: de ni bkra shis dam pa yin //
translated: are the highest good fortune.🔽Honouring one’s mother and father,🔽peacefulness, celibacy,

original: pha ma bsnyen bkur byed pa dang // zhi dang tshangs par spyod pa dang // 'byung po kun la snying brtse ba //
analyzed: pha ma bsnyen bkur byed pa dang // zhi dang tshangs par spyod pa dang // 'byung po kun la snying brtse ba //
translated: and compassion for all beings,

original: de ni bkra shis dam pa yin //
analyzed: de ni bkra shis dam pa yin //
translated: are the highest good fortune.🔽Turning away from evil actions,🔽relying on virtuous actions,

original: sdig pa'i las las ldog pa dang // dge ba'i las la bsten pa dang // bag yod pa dang rtag mkhas pa //
analyzed: sdig pa'i las las ldog pa dang // dge ba'i las la bsten pa dang // bag yod pa dang rtag mkhas pa //
translated: being heedful and always wise,

original: de ni bkra shis dam pa yin //
analyzed: de ni bkra shis dam pa yin //
translated: are the highest good fortune.

original: nga rgyal med dang khengs med dang // chog shes mthun pa'i 'tsho ba dang // rtag tu byas pa gzo byed pa //
analyzed: nga rgyal med dang khengs med dang // chog shes mthun pa'i 'tsho ba dang // rtag tu byas pa gzo byed pa //
translated: and always being grateful

original: de ni bkra shis dam pa yin //
analyzed: de ni bkra shis dam pa yin //
translated: are the highest good fortune.🔽Generosity, likewise patience,🔽joining with the noble ones,

original: sbyin spyod de bzhin bzod pa dang // 'phags pa rnams dang mthun sbyor dang // dus skabs su ni chos nyan pa //
analyzed: sbyin spyod de bzhin bzod pa dang // 'phags pa rnams dang mthun sbyor dang // dus skabs su ni chos nyan pa //
translated: and listening to the Dharma at the right time

original: de ni bkra shis dam pa yin //
analyzed: de ni bkra shis dam pa yin //
translated: are the highest good fortune.🔽Absence of laziness, great learning,🔽correct ascertainment of the Dharma,

original: le lo med dang mang thos dang // chos la legs par rnam nges dang // de bzhin sems la rnyog med pa //
analyzed: le lo med dang mang thos dang // chos la legs par rnam nges dang // de bzhin sems la rnyog med pa //
translated: and likewise a mind free of turbidity

original: de ni bkra shis dam pa yin //🔽gang zhig sems can thams cad la //
analyzed: de ni bkra shis dam pa yin // gang zhig sems can thams cad la //
translated: are the highest good fortune.🔽Whoever meditates on a mind of love

original: byams pa'i sems ni rab bsgom zhing //
analyzed: byams pa'i sems ni rab bsgom zhing //
translated: for all sentient beings

original: dpag tu med de mi 'khrug pa //
analyzed: dpag tu med de mi 'khrug pa //
translated: immeasurably and without disturbance

original: de ni bkra shis dam pa yin //🔽gang zhig 'phags pa'i bden rnams la //
analyzed: de ni bkra shis dam pa yin // gang zhig 'phags pa'i bden rnams la //
translated: is the highest good fortune.🔽Whoever purifies the eye of wisdom

original: shes rab mig @362a *//
analyzed: shes rab mig @362a *//
translated: regarding the noble truths

original: ni rnam sbyangs dang // tshul khrims nongs par ma gyur pa //
analyzed: ni rnam sbyangs dang // tshul khrims nongs par ma gyur pa //
translated: and does not violate ethical discipline

original: de ni bkra shis dam pa yin //
analyzed: de ni bkra shis dam pa yin //
translated: is the highest good fortune.

original: 'phags pa'i bden pa mthong ba dang // tshangs par spyod pa sgom pa dang // mya ngan 'das pa 'thob 'gyur ba //
analyzed: 'phags pa'i bden pa mthong ba dang // tshangs par spyod pa sgom pa dang // mya ngan 'das pa 'thob 'gyur ba //
translated: and attaining nirvana,

original: de ni bkra shis dam pa yin //
analyzed: de ni bkra shis dam pa yin //
translated: that is the highest auspiciousness.🔽Abandoning desire, hatred,🔽and ignorance,

original: gang zhig 'dod chags zhe sdang dang // ma rig pa yang rnam spangs dang // shes pa mi 'khrugs skye 'gyur ba //
analyzed: gang zhig 'dod chags zhe sdang dang // ma rig pa yang rnam spangs dang // shes pa mi 'khrugs skye 'gyur ba //
translated: and giving rise to unwavering knowledge,

original: de ni bkra shis dam pa yin //
analyzed: de ni bkra shis dam pa yin //
translated: that is the highest auspiciousness.

original: 'jig rten chos rnams kyis bskyod kyang //
analyzed: 'jig rten chos rnams kyis bskyod kyang //
translated: Even when shaken by worldly phenomena,🔽whose mind does not waver,

original: gang gi sems ni mi g-yo dang // dri med zhi dang mya ngan med //
analyzed: gang gi sems ni mi g-yo dang // dri med zhi dang mya ngan med //
translated: stainless, peaceful, and free from sorrow,

original: de ni bkra shis dam pa yin //
analyzed: de ni bkra shis dam pa yin //
translated: that is the highest auspiciousness.

original: de dang de ni ci rigs par //
analyzed: de dang de ni ci rigs par //
translated: Those and others,

original: 'di la bkra shis de dag ni //
analyzed: 'di la bkra shis de dag ni //
translated: in this world, are the auspicious things.

original: mkhas pa gang zhig bstod byed pa //
analyzed: mkhas pa gang zhig bstod byed pa //
translated: The wise one who praises them

original: de la rtag tu bkra shis 'gyur //
analyzed: de la rtag tu bkra shis 'gyur //
translated: will always have auspiciousness.

original: lhas zhus pa'i bkra shis kyi tshigs su bcad pa rdzogs so ///
analyzed: lhas zhus pa'i bkra shis kyi tshigs su bcad pa rdzogs so ///
translated: The verses on auspiciousness requested by the gods are complete.
